name: Privileged_Access_Abuse
postprocess: Check system integrity status, verify TCC database integrity, analyze entitlement violations, correlate with privilege escalation attempts.
examples: SIP disabled without user knowledge allowing system modification
TCC database manipulation to bypass privacy permissions
Sandbox entitlement violation to access restricted resources
remediation: Re-enable SIP protection, reset TCC permissions, verify system integrity, remove unauthorized profiles, restore from clean backup if needed.
description: Detects abuse of privileged access mechanisms and security control bypasses used by advanced spyware.
